SELECT d.dept_no, d.dept_name, d.dept_parent, COUNT(e.emp_no) AS count FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e ON d.dept_no = e.dept_no AND e.emp_status = 1 -- ✅ 필터를 JOIN 안으로 이동 GROUP BY d.dept_no, d.dept_name, d.dept_parent ORDER BY d.dept_no
